Welcome Back! TPB feels different without you 20-40! While there are other small-sizers -- none have the best selection like you are.  Speaking as small bandwidth torrent player myself, you're a life saver!

(i have to live with 175-350MB jon-stewart while you're away!)

People who showed appreciation already migrated on SU, where I upload same things as I have here in past. I've lost appreciation for TPB when I was banned by Moderator speaking the truth and in language well above TPB standards.

Therefore, having been banned instead of all lunatics who pounded my torrents with up to FIVE THOUSAND minuses in ONE NIGHT and insulting me on all imaginable ways - I left - and as many know - I am man of word.

I use TPB as backup location only, and people who need all imaginable torrents but away from this cuckoo's  nest - migrated to SU already.

I would never ever come back. As much as this place is duller without my presence - here is enough lunatics who actually are happy as a pig in mud.

Who is "clean", feel free to find my e-mail in many Descriptions of TV packs, introduce yourself in short mail and ask for Invite.

@killeurkilleur, et al:
To repeat:  Not everyone who downloads illegal video files owns a high def television. Most still watch on the good old fashioned computer screen--or even netbook, judging from the vast numbers that have been sold over the last 2 years. None of them require 720p--many stutter from video/cpu overload--as does my November2009 netbook, and my 2003 desktop; both play 480p quality videos quite nicely, thank you--even on my new 23" LCD screen. It is dipshits like you that cause good people to miss out on their favorite shows because the small-size encoders have "left the building". Aren't you proud of yourselves?

@killeurkilleur, et al:
Or maybe an insult your ilk CAN understand--COWKILLERS.  BEEFEATERS.  HALFCASTES.  UNTOUCHABLES.  LEFT HAND EATERS.
